forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 59F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the morning. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Periods of light rain early. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early giving way to clouds and a few showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. E winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. E winds shifting to NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 45F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.
